resources.string: Do you wish to delete the category \"%s\"?
InternalError: Check crash logs for further information
Let\'s set some things up first. You can always change these in the settings later too.

Select a folder where %1$s will store chapter downloads, backups, and more.

A dedicated folder is recommended.

Selected folder: %2$s
Updating from an older version and not sure what to select? Refer to the storage guide for more information.
Get notified for library updates and more.
Avoid interruptions to long-running library updates, downloads, and backup restores.
Send anonymized crash logs to the developers.
Send anonymized usage data to improve app features.
New to %s? We recommend checking out the getting started guide.
Secure screen hides app contents when switching apps and block screenshots
Sending crash logs and analytics will allow us to identify and fix issues, improve performance, and make future updates more relevant to your needs
Show in sources and extensions lists
This does not prevent unofficial or potentially incorrectly flagged extensions from surfacing NSFW (18+) content within the app.
Show unread count on Updates icon
Check for new cover and details when updating library
Entries in excluded categories will not be updated even if they are also in included categories.
Mark duplicate read chapter as read
Malicious extensions can read any stored login credentials or execute arbitrary code.\n\nBy trusting this extension, you accept these risks.
This extension is no longer available. It may not function properly and can cause issues with the app. Uninstalling it is recommended.
Do you really want to remove \"%s\" extension?
Sources from this extension may contain NSFW (18+) content
Permissions are needed to install extensions. Tap here to grant.
Install and start Shizuku to use Shizuku as extension installer.
Add additional repos to Mihon. This should be a URL that ends with \"index.min.json\".
Do you wish to delete the repo \"%s\"?
Do you wish to add the repo \"%s\"?
Repository %1$s has the same Signing Key Fingerprint as %2$s.\nIf this is expected, %2$s will be replaced, otherwise contact your repo maintainer.
Briefly show when reader is opened
If the placement of the split wide pages don\'t match reading direction
Flip orientation of rotated wide pages
Briefly show current mode when reader is opened
If reader loads a blank image incrementally reduce the threshold.\nSelected: %s
Use legacy decoder for long strip reader
Affects performance. Only enable if reducing bitmap threshold doesn\'t fix blank image issues
Creates folders according to entries\' title
Sensitivity for hiding menu on scroll
Entries in excluded categories will not be downloaded even if they are also in included categories.
Only works if the current chapter + the next one are already downloaded.
Update progress when marked as read
Automatically bind supported enhanced trackers when reading manga from compatible sources
One-way sync to update the chapter progress in external tracker services. Set up tracking for individual entries from their tracking button.
Provides enhanced features for specific sources. Entries are automatically tracked when added to your library.
Used for automatic backups, chapter downloads, and local source.
Can be used to restore current library
Backup does not contain any library entries.
You may need to install any missing extensions and log in to tracking services afterwards to use them.
What do you want to backup?
Include sensitive settings (e.g., tracker login tokens)
No library entries to back up
Backup/restore may not function properly if MIUI Optimization is disabled.
You should keep copies of backups in other places as well. Backups may contain sensitive data including any stored passwords; be careful if sharing.
Clear chapter cache on app launch
User agent string can not be blank
Requires app restart to take effect
Force app to recheck downloaded chapters
Delete history for entries that are not saved in your library
You’re about to remove entries from the database
Read chapters and progress of non-library entries will be lost
Resets reading mode and orientation of all series
Saves error logs to a file for sharing with the developers
Helps with background library updates and backups
Some manufacturers have additional app restrictions that kill background services. This website has more info on how to fix it.
Print verbose logs to system log (reduces app performance)
Update library manga titles to match source
Warning: if a manga is renamed, it will be removed from the download queue (if present).
Helps fix any bugs. No sensitive data will be sent
F-Droid builds are not officially supported.\nTap to learn more.
Filters all entries in your library
You have entries in your library with a similar name.\n\nSelect an entry to migrate or add anyway.
New chapters predicted to be released in around %1$s, checking around every %2$s.
This manga is either completed, or there is no predicted release date.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected chapters?
Are you sure you want to save these settings as default?
Also apply to all entries in my library
This will remove your previously selected start date from %s
This will remove your previously selected finish date from %s
This will remove the tracking locally.
A category with this name already exists!
This will remove the read date of this chapter. Are you sure?
Reset all chapters for this entry
Use this image as cover art?
Unable to open last read chapter
Are you sure? All history will be lost.
Select a source to migrate from
%s ran into an unexpected error. We suggest you share the crash logs in our support channel on Discord.
Couldn\'t download chapters. You can try again in the downloads section
Couldn\'t download chapters due to low storage space
Warning: large bulk downloads may lead to sources becoming slower and/or blocking Mihon. Tap to learn more.
Large updates harm sources and may lead to slower updates and also increased battery usage. Tap to learn more.
Please add the entry to your library before doing this
For help on how to fix library update errors, see %1$s
Skipped because there are unread chapters
Skipped because no chapters are read
Skipped because series does not require updates
Skipped because no release was expected today
Failed to acquire persistent folder access. The app may behave unexpectedly.
This Android version is no longer supported
No entries found in this category
You have no categories. Tap the plus button to create one for organizing your library.
You don\'t have any categories yet.
Tap here for help with Cloudflare
WebView is required for the app to function
Please update the WebView app for better compatibility
Could not download chapter due to unexpected error
Couldn\'t find file path of page %d
See your recently updated library entries
Widget not available when app lock is enabled
You are about to remove \"%s\" from your library
To show this screen again in the future, disable skipping in Settings → Browse
Use last used sources and preferences for migration
